improvedmapcolors.configuration.use_file: Use a list of colors from the CSV defined below
improvedmapcolors.configuration.title: Improved Map Colors Configuration
improvedmapcolors.configuration.color_fi:
Path to a CSV list of files like: |hex color|[optional id]|
If no ID is supplied, the id will be the column number in the file
improvedmapcolors.configuration.colorlis: List of colors to replace vanilla map colors, defaulting to Vanilla colors (gneiss colors)
